## searchTreeById() function

在树中找到 id 为某个值的节点，并返回上游的所有父级节点

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function searchTreeById<V>(
  tree: ArrayLike<V>,
  nodeId: IdLike,
  options?: ITreeConf
): [(number | string)[], ArrayLike<V>[]];
```

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 迭代配置项, 默认：<!-- -->{ children = 'children', id = 'id' }

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

\[(number \| string)\[\], ArrayLike&lt;V&gt;\[\]\]
